data.title: Ronald McDonald House Charities Southwest Virginia
data.meta_description: Ronald McDonald House Charities of Southwest Virginia provides a home for families while their child is in the hospital. Learn how you can stay or how to help.
data.meta_site_name: Ronald McDonald House of Southwest Virginia
data.text:
Come Stay with Us

Our House is a home-away-from-home where families can stay close, close to the care and resources they need, close to each other, and close to their child while they are in the hospital. We provide an inviting resting place for families that need to stay overnight, as well as the Ronald McDonald Family Room on the 14th floor of Carilion Children's Hospital for those who need a break without leaving the hospital.

Who Can Stay

Ways You Can Help

We can't do it without you, and we would love for you to get involved. There are many ways for you to join us in our mission to care for children by housing and caring for their families. Youâ€™ll get a great feeling helping families of sick and injured children stay close together. Check out the many ways you can help to keep families close when it matters the most.
